channel.title: Comments on: Free Domain Names From Microsoft
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: It's not the way I understood it, but who cares. Like you said, domain names are very cheap.
item.content:encoded: It’s not the way I understood it, but who cares. Like you said, domain names are very cheap.

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description:
They ask for your credit card in case you would also like to use the domain after the beta trial is over.
Fuck Microsoft! A .com domain costs $5 for 2 years.
item.content:encoded:
They ask for your credit card in case you would also like to use the domain after the beta trial is over.

Fuck Microsoft! A .com domain costs $5 for 2 years.
